item.title: Introduction
item.description: To start, I'd just like to share what I'm doing with Go, namely making a basic web server. Go is Google's new language, and it makes writing web applications super easy, as well as providing incredible scaling. Parse recently blogged about how they migrated from Ruby to Go.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: This is my first post, and tradition suggests that one should start with a salutation to the world. Since I'm learning Go, I thought it'd be appropriate to set the tone of this blog with a quick helloworld program in Go.
